tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE workout_classes_schedule (
    class_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    class_name VARCHAR(50),
    instructor_name VARCHAR(50),
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    max_capacity INT,
    current_attendance INT
);

CREATE TABLE workout_classes_schedule (
    class_id INT,
    class_name VARCHAR(255),
    class_date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE attendance_tracking (
    attendance_id INT,
    class_id INT,
    participant_id INT,
    attendance_date DATE,
    attendance_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE workout_classes_schedule (
    class_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    class_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    class_description TEXT,
    class_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    class_duration INTERVAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE class_attendance (
    attendance_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    class_id INT NOT NULL,
    student_id INT NOT NULL,
    attendance_status BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
    attended_on TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
